#include<stdio.h>
main()
{
	char s[100001],a;
	int  an[123]={0},i,count,max,ans;
	scanf("%s",s);
	i=0;
	while(s[i]!='\0')
	{a=s[i],count=0;
		while(s[i]==a){
			count++;
			i++;
		}
		if(count>an[a])
		an[a]=count;
	}max=-1;
	for(i=97;i<=122;i++)
	if(an[i]>max)
	max=an[i],ans=i;
	printf("%c\n%d",ans,max);
	
}
